creator: jon.mangin@comcast.net
text:
Unpatched Solaris 8 x86, PII 233, 256Mb. Manually set RM and AWK. Configure 
fails with ??? Make fails with ...httpd-2.0.48/server/main.c:619: undefined 
reference to `ap_prelinked_modules'. modules.c is zero-length. Too ignorant to 
know what else to say. I was told to attach conf output and config.log. Not 
seeing any way to do that, here goes...
Can you try this with 2.0.54, or a newer version of solaris?
creator: chip@force-elite.com
